reviewText: I had the first three classical baby DVDs and wanted to get this one as well.  It was not disappointing and had everything I wanted for my baby. She is 15 months old and doesn't yet like the slower poems, like William Shakespeare, but when she is a little older, I think she will get into the groove. So, if you like the first three, you will like this one as well. It has poems, songs, and children reading poems or talking about poems. It even has a poem in Spanish, which is very beautifully read by Andy Garcia.
summary: Good addition to classical baby series
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: Forget babies, I play this for my mother who has Alzheimer's. We have all the Classical Baby DVDS and play at least one of them every day. I never get tired of them.This video is for kids a little older, as it deals with poetry and words.We also have Goodnight Moon, bedtime stories with footage of kids in between talking about their concept of sleep and dreams. It's very persuasive.PLEASE HBO MAKE MORE OF THESE PROGRAMS!! These videos make great gifts for parents and little ones....or try it with the elderly, nursing homes, Alzheimer's units, senior day care centers. My mom loves little kids, so she can't get enough of these videos.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: I came upon this on hbo yesterday by 'accident'. What a lovely accident! I was thoroughly entertained, soothed, and entranced by what I was hearing/seeing. It was touching to hear some of my favorite poems talked about by these sweet, bright chidren, sung, read by stars and the artists themselves. It was a TREAT that fed me to my soul
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: It's a calm video that adults won't mind watching over and over. This is a really great series (the art and classical music ones, too). Our son even knows some of the lines of the poems which he says sometimes.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: My daughter loves this DVD.  Its very calming and is great before nap-time or bed-time.  I only wish they had more poems and less commentary.  The commentary interrupted the flow of the DVD, but its still great.  I hope they make another one.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: All Classical Baby shows - now including this one - are favorites of my daughter.  A welcome alternative to barely educational cartoons!
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: This is wonderful for even tinest one.  Wish every child could hear this just before nap or bed.  So soothing and educational.  Love it.  JLG
summary: A must for every mom and grandma.  Beautiful promotes sleep
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: This DVD is great for kids who want to know what poetry is.  The poems cover a wide range of styles and the kids commentaries are nice.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: 2 years old son loves all classical baby collection. he doesn't seem to be interested in this dvd. contents are very good, but not appealing to my son.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show

reviewText: I am not a poetry person but I do love this poetry DVD.]I appreciate watching the pictures / art. They are so beautiful and creative. My baby loves watching other children talk. She loves the songs. I wish the DVD can be longer. it feels like 15 minutes long to me.
Title: Classical Baby:I'm Grown Up Now:The Poetry Show
